1.content:
On a normal Friday afternoon you had just got home from work you pulled up outside of your house in your car. (sigh) what a long busy day its being you said in a fed up tone as you exited the vehical. Once your feet touched the ground you stretched and have a big yawn man I really need to get my head down you muttered as you slowy walked towards your house your door was just a few more feet away you'd never being so happy to see that old creaky door, you where almost there just a few more steps as you slowy reached out for the door handle.

You could feel the could metal of your door handle on the tips of your fingers but before you could grasp the handle you saw a bright flash to your right side then everything went dark.

Once you had regained conscious you took in your suroundings and were surprised at what you saw. All around you were anthromorthic animals but you could'nt help but notice some of these anthros looked familiar, then it hit you you had somehow being transpored to the world of Zootopia and you were only an inch tall!

You rose to your feet to get a better look at your suroundings from the look of things you where in.
1.title: A normal day

choices: You had found the bullpen and it's empty, Perfect
It was 10 inches tall. How did the ZPD handle cases in Little Rodentia?
11.content:
There was no mistaking the place with it's the decorative planters the row of trophy case and all the blue clad officers milling about. This may have all be a dream or hallucination, but even so. Anyone who had seen so much as one of the move trailers would recognize this place was the lobby of the ZPD.

Just then something large and gray took up your entire field of vision, coming down scale feet from where you where standing and almost knocking you off your feet as the ground shook. Just like that the wonderment of being in Zootopia was gone. It didn't seem to matter if you where dreaming or not as all your mind could focus on right now was a need for self preservation as you took to a full sprint.

Fueled with adrenaline it took a moment for your thoughts to catch up with your feet. This didn't feel like any dream you ever had, with the hammering in your chest, it actually felt terribly real. Whatever the case running blindly was starting to seem like a dumb move as more hoofed feet and paws came into your line of sight.

Switching to a different strategy you made your way to the closest wall reasoning that the foot traffic would be lighter. As your hands made contact with the tan wall you felt you breathed a heavy sigh before putting your back to the cool surface.

A quick look around confirmed that you were in the clear "for now". If anyone has noticed your presence at all they had dismissed it as no one who even glanced in your direction. As disturbing as the prospect of being too small to be noticed was, you decide that it's probably for the best that they had not. At least not for the moment. As you turned and began to make your way more slowly along the edge of the lobby. This whole situation was really just too much and right now you needed some space,maybe find a quiet room or even an air vent where you could lay low and sort things out.

After what felt like hours of consciously searching. You finally reach an open doorway and to your astonishment.
11.title: ZPD HQ

choices: Tap her foot to get her attention
111.content:
From the look of things this was her office the size of the desk, chair and computer is a dead giveaway. It looked like she was writing something down on a piece of paper " I wonder what it is " you looked round the room for a way to get up to her desk.

Looks like my only options are.
111.title: Judy Hopps was in there.

1112.content:
"Well, I guess i'll have to climb her chair." You said and then started climbing said chair slowly but surely. You kept climbing it and climbing it, making sure you didn't fall. "Woah!" You yelped as you felt yourself slipping a bit, but you soon kept your grip again. As soon as you did, you started to continue climbing until you reached the top.

After what seemed like an eternity, you finally climb the giant rabbits chair. You breath heavily due to climbing something that was really large compared to your current size. "Ha... Hey..., down here!" You said, but it seemed like Judy didn't notice you. You tried to scream to get her attention some more, but you saw her growing closer and closer to the chair. "Hey, stop, wait!" You screamed as Judy....
1112.title: Climb her chair

choices: hand slowly coming down to pick you up.
large clothed bulge. He had sat down on the floor in front of you.
112.content:
You found yourself coming to a complete stop when you inside the room to which you soon realized was a break room and saw Nick Wilde sitting in a nearby chair at one of the tables with a cup of coffee in his hands. You did your best to be quiet as you walked into the room while you heard the giant fox let out a bored sigh when he said out loud to himself, "Geez, I can't believe Carrots gets some time off and I'm stuck doing office duty while she's gone. Oh well maybe if I'm lucky something interesting will happen."

Hearing this prompted you to stop your walking and look up at the anthro cop as you thought to yourself, "What should I do? Should I try to get Nick's attention? I'm sure he'd help me out, but would he even notice me?"

But while you were thinking this you failed to notice that Nick had seen you try to sneak into the room. And before you knew it you heard the sound of a chair being pushed back before you noticed that he was now standing right in front of you. Once you did realize this you let out a gasp of surprise and turned around to look up only to see Nick's...
112.title: Nick Wilde was in there.

choices: Going to have you lick his feet till he can eat you tonight
1122.content:
Nick notices you and picks you up. "Well well, now YOU may just be able to provide the entertainment I need!"

Nick's...
1122.title: hand slowly coming down to pick you up.

11223.content: Nick walked back to the desk and grabbed some tape,he then taped you to his foot and continued his shift,walking around for what felt like hours,then he finally went home,he gets there and wonders
11223.title: Going to have you lick his feet till he can eat...

113.content:
Passing into the large empty space you look around in wonder as memories of the movie play out in your mind. The green carpeted floor was frayed and scuffed reminding you of the rambunctious antics of the officers the first time Judy had entered this very room. All the while your feet where subconsciously taking you towards the front. As your eyes locked onto the monolithic podium where Chief Bogo gave out daily assignments, you remembered the reason you had ducked in here in the first place. Pushing your feet to go faster in case someone came in, you made a beeline for the podium, hoping it would provide cover well you rested and collected your thoughts.


To your luck the building sized lectern turned out to be backless allowing its insides to be used as a small storage space. Promptly slipping inside it was mostly empty save for a collapsible step stool and hard plastic case with the stylized image of a pair of glasses etched into its top. Walking up to the glasses case which next to you was the size of a stretch limo and with a hop you manage to seat yourself on its top with your feet dangling over the edge. Giving one more look around you finally allow yourself to relax, closing your eyes and lying back against the cool plastic. It may not have been comfortable, but right now you really couldn't care less.



With the adrenaline wearing off your body was starting to ache from how tired you were. the flash and subsequent blackout that had landed you here had done nothing for your fatigue. Top it off with just how long it took to get around at this size and it was tempting to take a nap right here, but not yet. To you, being sore and tired was another reminder that this might actually be happening and you were quickly running out of alternative explanations. Your last reasonable argument being that you had slipped into a coma, not a pleasant thought. Still, your only other option was to admit that something Impossible had happened and you really were in Zootopia, but your sanity didn't want to take that leap just yet. Whatever the case It felt real and that was reason enough to start treating your current predicament very seriously.



Your first problem was you were in the ZPD and most of the building including this room was probably off limits to anyone that wasn't a cop. Second, you were tiny. Although it was difficult to tell just how small, what with everything being made for sentient mammals so your size was still an enigma. Still you had a fair guess that you were smaller than a mouse, maybe an inch tall and that made being here all the more difficult and dangerous. Problem number three, you where a human and there were no humans in Zootopia, not even primates if you remembered right. So you may as well have been an alien to them. Ya, that was probably going to get all kinds of awkward, but you couldn't hide forever. Your best bet would be to find someone who would not overreact and be in a position to help you.



Of course being in Zootopia a certain bunny came to mind, until a sudden and nasty thought put a wrench in that idea. What if this wasn't that Zootopia? True, this place looked like Zootopia, but what about the movie? Were you somewhere in the middle of it and there was a mad sheep out there darting predators with no one the wiser? Just when were you in the time line? Had Judy even been born yet? Retired? So far all you had seen where a few random cops and ever since you were almost stepped on, you had been too focused on avoiding paws and hooves to find out who they belonged to. You had yet to see anyone you could identify from the movies main cast and the longer you thought the wilder your imagination grow. Was this place anything like the movie? There were just too many possibilities. You needed answers before you worried yourself into a frenzy.

Leaping from the case you felt your legs throb in protest, but rest would have to wait. Right now you were determined to gather information. Anything that told you how this Zootopia compared to the one from the silver screen. A glance at the analogue clock behind the chiefs podium coupled with the darkening sky outside told you it was 8:40PM. Waiting for morning muster was out. A quick inspection of the boards and charts on the walls revealed little other then that the night shift would start in twenty minutes. For a moment you considered staying to listen in, but after finding an attendance roster for the shift and not recognizing any of the names. You decided your time would be better spent looking to see if any of the day officers were still in the building.



Making your way back to the door the sounds of activity from the lobby caught your ear, your pace slowed to a crawl. Giving your temporary sanctuary another look and seeing how everything here was looming over you. Now you where going to have to face the giants this room was meant for yet again. With a reflexive gulp of air you poked you head out at the gargantuan lobby trying to spot a familiar face in the crowd, but with each new mammal you couldn't keep your eyes from traveling down to the intimidating steps against the hard stone floor.
Pulling back from the sight you leaned against the door frame. No Bunnies or Foxes amongst the mass of larger officers not even the towering cape buffalo chief. If there was going to be a notable face out in that room it would be Clawhauser. The ZPD's receptionist and radio dispatcher, but the front desk was completely obscured from this angle and making your way to the center of the lobby was going to be next to impossible without being seen or worse. Of course you Knew you could just edge your way around the wall until you could see him, but just seeing him at a distance was pointless, not when what you really needed was news on this place.



No your best bet was to stay away from the crowds the lobby was so big you couldn't even pick up on what any one was saying over the cacophony of noise. A brake room would be ideal for eavesdropping. The problem was you still didn't know your way around. Your only choice was to keep exploring the ZPD until you ether found something useful or were discovered. With a deep breath you quietly make your way out staying to the walls. Seeing an enormous polar bear officer disappearing into a nearby hallway you decide to take the same route out of the lobby and deeper into precinct one.


Unable to keep up with the large officer you slow your pace, looking around the deserted corridor and spot several open doors. Deciding to check them out you feel a rush of relief when you notice there are small plastic placards next to each door. Grateful that someone at the ZPD had the sense to add labels. When you were close enough to the first one to read, you realize this was the entrance to...
113.title: The reality and the movie.

1132.content:
Just being in close proximity to the ZPD’s locker rooms felt like it must be braking some kind of law.
Your first impulse was to just move on and hope for better luck with the next door you came across. Yeah getting caught poking around the ZPD was bad enough, no point in digging a deeper hole for yourself. What could you possibly gain in a place like that?

After ten steps you stopped and slapped your face in frustration, of course you just had to ask, now you couldn't shake the feeling you were turning your back on something helpful. Glancing back through the opening, from this angle you could just see the beginning of a faded stack of blue locker’s, but you couldn’t believe what was on them, rubbing your eye’s in disbelief you saw brass name plate’s affixed above their vents. Not just numbers, but actual full names, what was more you thought you recognized the top one. “Francine Trunkaby” Wasn’t that the name of that elephant? This was the first time you had solid proof of a canon member of the cast. If her name was there then it stood to reason there would be more inside.

Rocking on your heels you waged an internal battle. Even being spotted in front of this door was bad news, but this was also a grate opportunity. If Judy existed as a cop in this world, her name would be on one of those lockers, right? What other options did you really have right now to collect such useful information? A full roster of ZPD personnel wasn’t going to be just lying on the floor for you and you’d need to be extremely lucky to be in the right place at the right time to eavesdrop on anything worth wile.

Straining your ears, you couldn’t make out any sound from inside other then the distant drip dripping of water. Licking your lips, you took a breath. The coast was clear, just dash in, read some names and tail it back out. If anyone came in, you had a better chance of finding cover in there then you did in this empty hallway. No one had seen you so far anyway. So, what was there to worry about?

Taking off at a jog you slipped around the dividing wall into what was presumably the female locker room. Even covering that relatively small distance was wearisome and you found yourself puffing in the humid air as you took cover under a nearby bench. Still collecting your breath, your stomach lurched as you registered the sound of approaching steps echoing off the tiled room. Pressing your back to one of the legs of your hiding place and closing your eyes you tried not to tremble. If you were discovered now of all times you didn’t want to see it coming. The sound drew closer until it seemed to be right on top of you, but you didn’t risk turning around.

The soft swish of clothing was heard and you found yourself looking up as the empty cuff of a police uniform appeared over the lip of your refuge. It was followed by the dull thud of the officer’s duty belt and there clipped to the belt alongside a set of hand cuffs, gleaming cold was a bronze ZPD shield, the officers name shining under the words bravery, integrity, trust.

Realizing it was highly unlikely she would remove her belt if she knew you were here you slumped to the ground in relief. This was not how you wished to introduce yourself to officer…
1132.title: In the locker rooms.

choices: She grabs her foot pads(including you)
11321.content: As she came in,you decided to hide in a locker,you ran to a locker and decided to hide behind a black piece of cloth,that's when judy opens the locker door
11321.title: Hopps

choices: She noticed you the whole time
She is unaware and sleeps with you on
113212.content: Judy then replaced her foot pads with the one your in,your now stuck under her paw,she walks around the ZPD,talking to nick and doing case work when she gets home
113212.title: She grabs her foot pads(including you)

choices: “She” was singing the year of the cat.
11322.content:
A massive orange paw suddenly appeared to your left and you froze like a statue, if you had been found escape was futile, the row of lockers before you offered no shelter and may as well have been an endless wall. The other three sides of your bench were just open floor. Crossing that flat expanse was pointless. Tigers were supposed to be fast to begin with and this one was as big as an office building. You’d never stand a chance.

The sudden slam of a metal door made you wince the paw’s twin came into view and to your relief Fangmeyer had turned away and headed for the back of the room. With each casual step you could see more of the tigers retreating form, bare legs gave way to a pair of blue shorts or boxers it was hard to say, then the fur of its lower back. A white towel came into view next, slung carelessly over a broad shoulder. Just as the tips of Fangmeyers ears were no longer obstructed by the roof of your hiding place offering you a full view of the felines body. The tiger slipped into one of the shower stalls and drew the curtain. The towel flopped over the curtain rod and was joined by the tiger’s blue shorts a moment later.

As the hissing of water came to your ears and steam began billowing over the top of the stall you found your feet. Leaving was the first thing that came to mind, but it also felt like a waist to just go without getting anything for your trouble. Looking around you started to find other places you could use to keep out of sight. A chink between two lockers across the room, a laundry hamper by the last shower stall, a discarded mop head just a few yards away. Although to you it was more like a couple of hundred. Looking back to the door you wade your options. While a strait shot to the exit would take less time. Taking cover and working your way around the room might be safer and even gave you the chance to achieve your original goal.

With a huff you stretched your legs and prepared for another dash. It wasn’t like you had a time limit or anywhere better to be. For all you knew someone might be waiting for the tiger out there. Better to find a more discrete hiding place and wait it out just to be safe. A few steps from your first resting place you slowed your pace. The sound of melodic humming had come from the direction of the occupied shower. You and half the fans of the movie could never really agree on the tiger’s gender, but now it was pretty obvious and you couldn’t help the grin that spread across your face when Fangmeyer started singing. There were differences from the song you knew, but you still recognized it.
11322.title: Crouching tiger, hidden human.

15.content: You found yourself having to rub your eyes for a few seconds before blinking a few times. Once you did this you saw that you were in.....
15.title: More Locations.

154.content:
You couldn’t believe it all around you were giant anthromorthic animals and you were on the floor!! You immediately looked around trying to find a bench or table anything to shield you from the stomping feet of these animals. “Damn it I gotta get moving” you said to yourself as you dodged an incoming lioness her mighty foot came down missing you completely but it shook the ground a little which made you loose your balance.

“Fuch me” you muttered as you picked yourself up off the ground and began to dust yourself off. While you were busy straightening your clothes out everything suddenly got a little bit dark. You felt a great amount of fear as you looked up thinking it was another foot coming to squish you, but thankfully it wasn’t. To your embarrassment you were standing between two massive legs. Looking up you saw that the person standing over you was a female Labrador and you had a clear view up her skirt.

You quickly looked away thinking back to all the lessons your mother taught you about being a gentleman and showing respect to women. While you were distracted the Labrador began to walk forward. Your eyes darted to her moving feet as they began to stomp away from you. Once you saw that things got a little brighter you looked up and got a view of the female dogs fine behind which looked like it wiggled with every step she took.

“Damn it Jason get your mind out of the gutter” you said to yourself still keeping your eyes on the dog seeing where she goes. The female lab walked up to a pare of German shepherds which were unawarely blocking a bench, the Labrador just pushed past seeing that the two canines didn’t care if she wanted to get past.

The two lightly glared at her before walking away. Now that the two dogs were gone you had a clear path to the bench.
154.title: Central Station.

1543.content: You gasped as you felt someone’s fingers gently wrap around your torso and lift you up in the air. You couldn’t make out what kinda animal it was til it brought you up to the same level as it’s face. To your surprise it was a.
1543.title: Someone suddenly picked you up

choices: Your kind is an endangered spieces
154312.content:
From what you could see the lioness was wearing a tank top and had two different coloured eyes, the right one was gold but the other was a faded grey. You were about to say something but before the words left your mouth the lioness lips parted. Her jaws opened wide revealing her massive sharp fangs , the sight was enough to make you scream but as you opened your mouth a sudden gust of rancid air blew into your mouth making you cough and gag. “Oh sorry about that.” You heard a gentle voice say. Looking in the direction you saw the lioness had a little smile in her face and she looked like she was embarrassed about something.

“Sorry about yawning in your face and for the smell it’s kinda being a bad morning for me.” She was only yawning? You breathed a sigh of relief “well at least she’s not gonna eat me” you said quietly so she couldn’t hear you. “Oh and I’m very sorry for just picking you up without permission but I was afraid that if I didn’t you might get stepped on.”

“It’s fine” you said. The lioness calmed down a bit when she heard you say it was ok “oh thank goodness the last thing I need is another find from the police, and I hope you don’t take this the wrong way but what are you?” You tensed up at the question fuck do I tell her that I’m a human and probably some kinda alien to them or that I’m like an endangered spieces.

You gave it a good thought before telling her.
154312.title: Female

1543121.content:
You tried to explain your situation to the lioness as best as you could but she just gave a smile of disbelief. “Yeah right and I’m next in line to be the mayor, why don’t you just tell me the truth” the lioness said as she crossed her free arm over her chest which pushed her big boobs up a bit. “Damn she must be a D-cup with breasts that big” you said out loud luckily not loud enough for the lion to hear.

“Look I swear it’s the truth, why don’t you try looking up my spieces or something.” The lioness gave it a thought before shrugging her shoulders “what’s in it for me?” You gsve a look of disbelief “what the hell do you mean what’s in it for you, your the one who wants to know if I’m lying or not” the lioness rolled her eyes in thought before nodding. “Yeah true but let’s say you are an alien and I do believe you which I don’t, what would you plan to do on a world were you barely come up to a mouses hip.”

“You make it sound like I said my kind are a highly advanced race and are the galaxies greatest conquers.” The lioness let out a little chuckle at the thought “no I mean if you truly are trapped on this world that means you have no where to go or anyone to look out for you.” You ohh in realisation. “Well I don’t know can’t you help me?” The lioness hummed in thought “I could but it’s sounds like you’d be more trouble than your worth, I mean I’d have to watch where I step all the time and make sure to check all the seats so I don’t sit on you, and watch what I’m eating in case your in the food.”

You hung your head in sadness knowing what her answer was going to be. “Of cause I’ll help you.” Your head shot back up and you saw the lioness with a big smile on her face. “But I thought..”

“I was just messing with ya little guy, besides if you are the real deal then I wanna be the first who discovered a new spieces.”

You and the lioness talked for awhile as she made her way home. On the way to her house she ran into.
1543121.title: Your not from this world

15433.content: How about one of these.
15433.title: Other

154331.content: So is this hand of Judy or other rabbit?
154331.title: Bunny

1543311.content:
This hand or may I correct a paw really is the Judy Hopps.
I'm only half inch tall and you assume that is more or less an average mouse anthro. You cannot believe this you are in white and grey paw/grip of officer Judy Hopps! She is like 380foot (116meter) GIANTESS to you!!! (Judy's height is 2 ft 8 inches = 0.8 m with her ears)

This is awesome you think and look her big blue eyes. "Hello my name is Jason and you are? You ask and offer your free hand outside Judy's grip to Judy who is giantess to you. Like you don't supposedly know who she is and yeah there is no even slightest possibility make a proper handshake (Size difference is way too big) with this giant female bunny (to you she is truly a giantess). Judy face expression is _____ and she replies_____. (You can decide what is her reply on next chapter ;) )
1543311.title: Judy Hopps

154334.content:
Now you realize!
The giant (to you) fingers or maybe better word is paw and giant face (to you) belongs to ______!
154334.title: Other

choices: Male fox. Do know this dude?
1543341.content: A fox is giant to your size???!!!! And this paw and face of the fox is definitely a ______. Oh boy!
1543341.title: A fox!

15433412.content:
"_______________!" You shout. "Release me! Let go off me you damn fox!" you shout more angrier this time
The fox moves his fist and you closer his eye.You feel a warm breath from maw a closer your feet. He don't say anything and it's just his normal breathing out.

Wait......wait a damn moment the grip of this fox fist didn't get any loose and you might even feel it tighten a little. Damn he doesn't want give me any chance to escape you think. Oh this is no good. I'm or more like my whole life is in his hand literally (a pun intended) you think and feel how cold sweat drops start form on you forehead. Do I even have any strength
to do anything? He is so much bigger than me. You just make question yourself.
15433412.title: Male fox. Do know this dude?

info.brief_description: you awake in the city of zootopia but everything is gigantic how will you survive?
info.description:
Your name is Jason knight your 18 years old with a muscular build you also have black hair and bright blue eyes that always look like they’re shining. Your hobbies are drawing exercising and going on adventures, you hate bullying and people who think they are superior to everyone else.

Oh by the way if you would like to add OCs that perfectly fine with me.

The following vore, AV, CV foot, breasts male on male is fine. But I don't wanna see any scat or any other humans entering this story and no size changing you can't grow back to normal size.

Oh and there can be death in this if you like it can be as Bloody as you like.

Update.
With Jason only been half an inch tall he would only come up to an anthro mouses hip. Also seen as he started off big then shrunk down he still has quite a bit of durability to him but if something like an elephant were to step on him then he’d be dead.

Jason also has his regular human strength and speed which at his size would make him look like some kinda super human to the residents of little rodentia.
